dict.string: This app accesses your calendar to display your appointments alongside your logged patterns, helping you understand how events may relate to your behaviors and experiences.
This app accesses your calendar to display your appointments alongside your logged patterns, helping you understand how events may relate to your behaviors and experiences.
This app uses the microphone to record voice notes in your journal entries and for voice-to-text input when logging patterns.
This app uses speech recognition to convert your voice into text when logging patterns, making it easier to add notes when typing is difficult.
